title: Iron Mask: Peace is Your Birthright
description: Iron Mask is a self-help book of pain, joy, learning, and the personal growth accompanied from triumph over adversity. The author provides insights into life’s lessons, gained from painful experiences. The poetry carries this epic narrative and contributes to a happier and more successful life. If chaos and pain are your companions, where have you hidden your peace?Let your guilt conscience go and allow the Iron Mask to help increase the love and respect you wish to express to others and claim for yourself. For people affected with codependency, the letting go process increases the love, honor, and respect available when accepting their natural birthright of peace.Those who enjoy the benefits of introspection, especially people in AA, NA, Al-Anon and other 12 step programs will gain many bits of life’s mysteries offered in the Iron Mask.
author: David Walton Earle
